name: Slim Wallet No. 1
description: This minimalist wallet is designed to be simple and thin. It is ideal for 3-4 Cards, but can stretch to accommodate up to 6. The pull-up leather develops striking character as it lightens in color in areas where pressure is applied. Hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread. Made with Chromexcel from the legendary Horween tannery in Chicago. From Horween: "Chromexcel is the original pull-up leather; using time honored techniques and formulas that were developed nearly 100 years ago. Chromexcel is still produced in the United States using a bark retannage from a proprietary recipe, and then genuine hot stuffed with our secret blend of natural oils and greases. Chromexcel is characterized by a rich pull-up in full aniline, hand rubbed finishes. Made to this day with old world craftsmanship, modern Chromexcel carries on a long history of superior comfort and durability." DIMENSIONS: 2 3/4" x 3 3/4" Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: iPhone Sleeve No. 1  for 5, 5S & 5C (Natural Chromexcel)
description: Made from a single piece of 3-4 oz Horween Chromexcel and hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread, this iPhone sleeve is made to fit the iPhone 5, 5S and 5C. Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Tuck Wallet No. 1 (Natural Chromexcel)
description: Our Chromexcel tuck wallet features a card pocket on either side and a tuck in the middle that can hold cash folded in half. The wallet is hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread. DIMENSIONS: 4 1/4" x 2 7/8" Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Moleskine Volant Cover (Brown Chromexcel)
description: This is the smaller sibling to our Field Notes and Cahier Covers. Featuring two oversized flaps, our Moleskine Volant covers provide smooth writing surfaces underneath each page. The left flap remains open at the top for added flexibility. It's ideal for business cards, credit cards, a secret stash of cash, or another Volant Notebook. Made from 4 oz Horween Chromexcel leather and hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread. The pull-up leather will develop character as it lightens in color in areas where pressure is applied. Notebook not included. From Horween: "Chromexcel is the original pull-up leather; using time honored techniques and formulas that were developed nearly 100 years ago. Chromexcel is still produced in the United States using a bark retannage from a proprietary recipe, and then genuine hot stuffed with our secret blend of natural oils and greases. Chromexcel is characterized by a rich pull-up in full aniline, hand rubbed finishes. Made to this day with old world craftsmanship, modern Chromexcel carries on a long history of superior comfort and durability." DIMENSIONS: Closed- 3" x 4 5/8" Open- 6 1/8" x 4 5/8" Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: iPad Mini Sleeve (Burgundy Chromexcel)
description: Our iPad Mini covers are made from 4 oz. Horween Chromexcel and hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread. The covers are made to fit both a bare iPad Mini as well as one with an attached Smart Cover. This pull up leather will develop striking character as it lightens in areas where pressure is applied. From Horween: "Chromexcel is the original pull-up leather; using time honored techniques and formulas that were developed nearly 100 years ago. Chromexcel is still produced in the United States using a bark retannage from a proprietary recipe, and then genuine hot stuffed with our secret blend of natural oils and greases. Chromexcel is characterized by a rich pull-up in full aniline, hand rubbed finishes. Made to this day with old world craftsmanship, modern Chromexcel carries on a long history of superior comfort and durability." Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Moleskine Volant Cover (Veg Tan)
description: This is the smaller sibling to our Field Notes and Cahier Covers. Featuring two oversized flaps, our Moleskine Volant covers provide smooth writing surfaces underneath each page. The left flap remains open at the top for added flexibility. It's ideal for business cards, credit cards, a secret stash of cash, or another Volant Notebook. These notebooks are made from 4 oz. Hermann Oak vegetable tanned leather and are hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread and likewise hand burnished with beeswax for a fine edge. Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each cover will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. Notebook not included. DIMENSIONS: Closed- 3" x 4 5/8" Open- 6 1/8" x 4 5/8" Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Men's 1.5" Veg Tan Belt (Brass)
description: Our men's belts are made from 8-9 oz natural vegetable tanned leather. They feature solid brass hardware and are secured with hand hammered solid copper rivets. The edges are hand burnished and finished with beeswax. Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each belt will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. There are a variety of oils and conditioners that can be applied to veg-tan leather. My own preferred method is to first apply neatsfoot oil, let that dry, then apply a beeswax based conditioner while gently heating the leather. The heat (not too hot, you don't want to damage the leather) will melt the wax and help it to soak into the leather. After waxing, let it sit for 20 minutes to an hour and buff off the excess with a soft cloth. Measuring: Do not enter your pant size. Measure your waist through your belt loops. This is your belt size, which is where the middle hole will be. Please contact us if you have any questions about sizing, as belts are custom cut, making all belt sales final and non-returnable unless there is a mistake on our part. If your size isn't listed, please contact us. It's possible we can accommodate larger sizes, but longer straps may require extra time. Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

From Horween: "Chromexcel is the original pull-up leather; using time honored techniques and formulas that were developed nearly 100 years ago. Chromexcel is still produced in the United States using a bark retannage from a proprietary recipe, and then genuine hot stuffed with our secret blend of natural oils and greases. Chromexcel is characterized by a rich pull-up in full aniline, hand rubbed finishes. Made to this day with old world craftsmanship, modern Chromexcel carries on a long history of superior comfort and durability." Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Field Notes & Moleskine Cahier Cover (Veg Tan)
description: Featuring two oversized flaps, our Field Notes covers provide smooth writing surfaces underneath each page. The left flap remains open at the top for added flexibility. It's ideal for business cards, credit cards, a secret stash of cash, or another Field Notes Notebook. Please note that this cover can also hold two Moleskine Cahiers, but it will be a tighter fit than two Field Notes. Each cover is made with 3-4 oz Hermann Oak Vegetable tanned leather and is hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread. The edges are finely burnished and coated with beeswax. Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each cover will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. Dimensions: Open 6 1/16" x 8 3/16" Closed 4" x 6 1/16" Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Large Moleskine Cover (Veg Tan)
description: Our Moleskine covers are made from 4-5 oz Hermann Oak vegetable tanned leather. They're hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread and likewise hand burnished with beeswax for a fine edge. Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each cover will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. Made to fit the hardcover Large Moleskine but also fits the softcover Large Moleskine as well. Notebook not included. Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Large Webbie Cover (Veg Tan)
description: Our Rhodia Webnotebook covers are made from 4-5 oz Hermann Oak vegetable tanned leather. They're hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread and likewise hand burnished with beeswax for a fine edge. Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each cover will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. We can also make this cover in any of our Chromexcel colors. Just ask! Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Pocket Moleskine Cover (Veg Tan)
description: Our Pocket Moleskine covers are made from 3-4 oz Hermann Oak vegetable tanned leather. They're hand stitched with waxed Irish linen thread and likewise hand burnished with beeswax for a fine edge. Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each cover will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. Made to fit the hardcover Pocket Moleskine but also fits the softcover Moleskine as well. Notebook not included. Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Men's 1.5" Veg Tan Belt (Nickel)
description: Our men's belts are made from 8-9 oz natural vegetable tanned leather. They feature solid brass hardware and are secured with hand hammered solid copper rivets. The edges are hand burnished and finished with beeswax. Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each belt will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. There are a variety of oils and conditioners that can be applied to veg-tan leather. My own preferred method is to first apply neatsfoot oil, let that dry, then apply a beeswax based conditioner while gently heating the leather. The heat (not too hot, you don't want to damage the leather) will melt the wax and help it to soak into the leather. After waxing, let it sit for 20 minutes to an hour and buff off the excess with a soft cloth. Measuring: Do not enter your pant size. Measure your waist through your belt loops. This is your belt size, which is where the middle hole will be. Please contact us if you have any questions about sizing, as belts are custom cut, making all belt sales final and non-returnable unless there is a mistake on our part. If your size isn't listed, please contact us. It's possible we can accommodate larger sizes, but longer straps may require extra time. Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

This is your belt size, which is where the middle hole will be. Please contact us if you have any questions about sizing, as belts are custom cut, making all belt sales final and non-returnable unless there is a mistake on our part. If your size isn't listed, please contact us. Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Belt Lanyard (Veg Tan)
description: This belt lanyard comes with your choice of matte nickel, polished brass or antique brass hardware. It is 5/8" wide and made from natural vegetable tanned leather. It is made to fit belts with a width up to 1 1/2". Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each lanyard will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: Key Fob (Veg Tan)
description: This key fob comes with your choice of a nickel or antique brass key ring. It is made from natural vegetable tanned leather. Over time the leather will darken first to a honey color and then to a deeper warmed brown. Each key fob will take on a different character based on the use and wear of the owner. Direct exposure to sunlight will darken the leather, as will oil and wax. Orders will ship within 6 weeks.

name: USPS Priority Shipping 1-3 days (Inside the US)
description:
If you need your item shipped quickly, add on priority shipping through USPS for 1-3 day shipping anywhere within the United States.

Normal product creation times still apply.

Note, this shipping is added on to the current shipping cost of $3.50 for most domestic orders. Also note that all belts already feature priority shipping.

name: USPS Express Shipping 1 day (Inside the US)
description:
If you need your item shipped as soon as possible, add on Express shipping through USPS for 1 day shipping anywhere within the United States.

Normal product creation times still apply.

Note, this shipping is added on to the current shipping cost of $3.50 for most domestic orders. Also note that all belts already feature priority (1-3 day) shipping.
